OUTFITS: Glossy latex nun habit with corset lacing and slit skirt
Translucent veil over leather harness and clerical collar
Stained altar-lace gown with torn hem and barbed accents
Black satin cassock cinched by chain belt and thorned corset
LIGHTING: Candlelit flicker with deep shadow falloff
Backlit incense haze, hard key on face
BACKGROUNDS: Torn red velvet drapery with faint iconography
Cracked cathedral wall with faded murals
OBJECTS: Broken silver crucifix held near lips
Cracked sacred host with symbolic bleed
CAMERA_ANGLES: Extreme close-up on eyes and lips
ACCESSORIES: Stigmata rings and nail-shaped veil pins

HORROR_INTENSITY.0: Suggestive sacrilege: inverted symbols, subtle blood tears, veiled sensuality; mood unsettling but restrained.
HORROR_INTENSITY.1: Brazen desecration: visible stigmata, barbed rosary impressions, blood-smeared lips; erotic charge with clear menace.
HORROR_INTENSITY.2: Ritual gore: cruciform cuts and dripping thorns, a bleeding communion wafer; unholy ecstasy at the edge of taboo.
